name: Oil Change
description: Replace engine oil and oil filter

name: Brake Service
description: Inspect and replace brake pads and rotors if necessary

name: Tire Rotation
description: Rotate tires to ensure even wear and extend tire life

name: Wheel Alignment
description: Align wheels to improve handling and prevent uneven tire wear

name: Coolant Flush
description: Flush and refill cooling system to prevent overheating

name: Fuel System Cleaning
description: Clean fuel injectors and throttle body for improved performance

name: Air Filter Replacement
description: Replace engine air filter for improved air flow and performance

name: Spark Plug Replacement
description: Replace spark plugs for improved fuel efficiency and performance

name: Battery Replacement
description: Replace battery if it is no longer holding a charge

name: Alternator Replacement
description: Replace alternator if it is no longer charging the battery

name: Starter Replacement
description: Replace starter if the engine is not cranking

name: Radiator Replacement
description: Replace radiator if it is leaking or no longer cooling the engine

name: Thermostat Replacement
description: Replace thermostat if the engine is running too hot or too cold

name: Timing Belt Replacement
description: Replace timing belt to prevent engine damage

name: Water Pump Replacement
description: Replace water pump if it is leaking or no longer circulating coolant

name: Suspension Inspection
description: Inspect suspension components for wear and damage
